Javor odgovorio Inđiji: Čast i bruka žive dovijeka
“Bolje častan poraz nego nečasna pobeda”, poručuju iz Ivanjice u obimnom saopštenju

05 Nov 2019

Iako je kontroverzna utakmica između Inđije i Javora (2:3) odigrana još pre tri dana, polemika ne prestaje.
Prvo su se u zvaničnom saopštenju odmah posle utakmice žalili čelnici kluba iz Srema, zatim je reagovao i član sudijske komisije FSS-a Igor Radojičić koji je ocenio da su odluke glavnog arbitra Bojana Nikolića bile ispravne, a danas je svoj zvanični stav izneo i Javor Matis.
Klub iz Ivanjice je u obimnom saopštenju na svom sajtu naveo sve sporne situacije i zaključio da nema mesta primedbama od strane vojvođanskog kluba. U Javoru konstatuju da su čak i oštećeni u Inđiji, jer im je poništen gol zbog dosuđenog ofsajda, što prema njihovom mišljenju nije bio slučaj.
Ipak, Ivanjičani ističu da smatraju da su u pitanju bili "previdi arbitra" i nemaju nikakve sumnje u njegove namere, a njihovo kompletno saopštenje pročitajte OVDE.

Maple replied to Indjija: Honor and blame live forever
"Better honorable defeat than dishonorable victory", Ivanjica said in a comprehensive statement

05 Nov 2019

Although the controversial match between Indjija and Javor (2: 3) was played three days ago, the controversy does not end.
First in the official announcement immediately after the game, the leaders of the club from Srem complained, then also a member of the FSS Judge Committee Igor Radojicic reacted, who assessed that the decisions of the Chief Arbitrator Bojan Nikolic were correct, and today Javor Matis also made his official statement. .
The club from Ivanjica, in an extensive statement on its website, listed all the disputed situations and concluded that there was no room for objections from the Vojvodina club. Javor states that they were even damaged in Indjija, because they were canceled a goal due to the offside awarded, which in their opinion was not the case.
However, the citizens of Ivanjica say that they believe they were "overlooked by the arbitrator" and have no doubt about his intentions, and read their full statement HERE.
